alert.note: Alert for Edmunds; Faulk (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 10:22AM MDT until July 07 at 11:00AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Edmunds County in north central South Dakota... Northeastern Faulk County in north central South Dakota... * Until noon CDT. * At 1122 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Blumengard Colony, or 12 miles south of Ipswich, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Pembrook Colony around 1135 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Cresbard. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
